TEXT.TITLE: NORTHERN INDIANA <NI> 12 MTHS FEB 28 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 66 cts vs profit 1.07 dlrs Net loss 20,957,000 vs profit 11,041,000 Revs 1.54 billion vs 1.85 billion Avg shrs 73.2 mln vs 71.7 mln NOTE: 1986 net excludes charge of 94.8 mln dlrs or 1.32 dlrs a share from abandonment of Bailly nuclear plant. Northern Indiana Public Service Co is full name of company. Reuter
